bug.summary: kustomize should fail if it can't find a component in app.yaml
bug.description: kustomize package-manager will do a best-effort in generating and deploying components. It should error out if the component can't be found

Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kkasravi>@kkasravi</denchmark-link> for opening this issue! Giving a little more context on how this came up: What happened:
I used kfctl + kustomize to install Kubeflow. My KfDef included component istio. I deployed Kubeflow but I saw that Istio was not installed. Istio was not installed because it is in package gcp, a package I had not included in KfDef.
What I expected to happen:
Istio should be installed since I specified it in components. If Istio (or any component) can't be installed (because it can't be found), kfctl should fail and not succeed.
